 @dev Can only be called after the game is completed.

adminFeeWithdraw().details: Cannot be called before the game ends.

params._customFee: performance fee charged by admin. Used as an integer percentage (i.e., 10 represents 10%). Does not accept "decimal" fees like "0.5".
params._dataProvider: id for getting the data provider contract address 0x1 to be passed.
params._earlyWithdrawalFee: Fee paid by users on early withdrawals (before the game completes). Used as an integer percentage (i.e., 10 represents 10%). Does not accept "decimal" fees like "0.5".
params._inboundCurrency: Smart contract address of inbound currency used for the game.
params._lendingPoolAddressProvider: Smart contract address of the lending pool adddress provider.
params._maxPlayersCount: max quantity of players allowed to join the game
params._segmentCount: Number of segments in the game.
params._segmentLength: Lenght of each segment, in seconds (i.e., 180 (sec) => 3 minutes).
params._segmentPayment: Amount of tokens each player needs to contribute per segment (i.e. 10*10**18 equals to 10 DAI - note that DAI uses 18 decimal places).

earlyWithdraw().details: Cannot be called after the game is completed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

redeemFromExternalPool().details: Can only be called after the game is completed.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

adaiToken().notice: Address of the interest bearing token received when funds are transferred to the external pool

adminFeeAmount().notice: performance fee amount allocated to the admin

adminFeeWithdraw().notice: Allows the admin to withdraw the performance fee, if applicable. This function can be called only by the contract's admin.

adminWithdraw().notice: controls if admin withdrew or not the performance fee.

methods.constructor: Creates a new instance of GoodGhosting game

daiToken().notice: Address of the token used for depositing into the game by players (DAI)

earlyWithdraw().notice: Allows a player to withdraws funds before the game ends. An early withdrawl fee is charged.

getCurrentSegment().notice: Calculates the current segment of the game.

getNumberOfPlayers().notice: gets the number of players in the game

isGameCompleted().notice: Checks if the game is completed or not.

iterablePlayers(uint256).notice: controls the amount deposited in each segment that was not yet transferred to the external underlying poollist of players

joinGame().notice: Allows a player to join the game

lastSegment().notice: The number of segments in the game (segment count)

lendingPoolAddressProvider().notice: Which Aave instance we use to swap DAI to interest bearing aDAI

makeDeposit().notice: Allows players to make deposits for the game segments, after joining the game.

maxPlayersCount().notice: Defines the max quantity of players allowed in the game

pause().notice: pauses the game. This function can be called only by the contract's admin.

players(address).notice: Stores info about the players in the game

redeemFromExternalPool().notice: Redeems funds from the external pool and updates the internal accounting controls related to the game stats.

redeemed().notice: Controls if tokens were redeemed or not from the pool

segmentLength().notice: The time duration (in seconds) of each segment

segmentPayment().notice: The amount to be paid on each segment

totalGameInterest().notice: Stores the total amount of net interest received in the game.

unpause().notice: unpauses the game. This function can be called only by the contract's admin.

withdraw().notice: Allows player to withdraw their funds after the game ends with no loss (fee). Winners get a share of the interest earned.

userdoc.notice: Used for the games deployed on Polygon using Aave as the underlying external pool.
